name: Contently, Inc.
description: Developer of a content-marketing platform designed to help global enterprises to create engaging and accountable content. The company's platform helps brands in creating, distributing, and optimizing content, enabling businesses to manage all corporate content in one place, streamline approval processes and optimize all aspects of content marketing.
one_liner: Developer of a content-marketing platform designed to help global enterprises to create engaging and accountable content. The company's platform helps brands in creating, distributing, and optimizing content, enabling businesses to manage all corporate content in one place, streamline approval processes and optimize all aspects of content marketing.
